data.name: Love, Money, Lust
data.detailed_description:
Lust Trip is a romantic visual novel about a guy that is forced to travel across the country because of a promise he made while drunk.

Everything started with a simple Christmas party that he was invited to. Everything went fine - a lot of new friends, alcohol, fun. But then he noticed a strange girl who was constantly smoking at the balcony. Her name was Alice. He approached her, then they had a small talk, which turned into a whole intimate conversation about our heroes' beliefs. He promised he would "do whatever he can" to help Alicewith her dream, and as it turned out - it was a bad idea...

Lust Trip is a story about love and self-acceptance, get to know Alice better and discover the truth behind her dream, maybe she is not a bad person after all?

data.short_description: Lust Trip is a romantic visual novel about a guy that is forced to travel across the country because of a promise he made while drunk.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This visual novel contains lewd jokes, sexual themes and dialogue.
